entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
